docs.title: Archive Data Model
docs.text:
The archive data model describes the observatory data products (ODP) and advanced data products (ADP) that are available within the archive. This data model forms an essential building block for services including

  • location independent referencing
  • discovery
  • smart data transfer

docs.title: Introduction
docs.text: Describes the ODPs and ADPs available within SRCNet

docs.title: Overview diagram
docs.text:
